content: pdf version comes with two ways of making the head - one with an embroidered face one using mohair yarn to give a fluffy face hood is made separately height approx 5 5 tall **updated pattern** in pdf form http //groups google com/group/lucyravenscarpatterns/web/wicket%20the%20ewok%20amigurumi pdf pattern also available at craftster http //www craftster org/forum/index php topic=130572 msg1344548#msg1344548 pattern originally posted as designer name angry angel ana has kindly translated this pattern into spanish hastaelmonyo com/ p=1665 to download the pdf pattern click over the image available on lovecrafts here 1 1 https //www lovecrafts com/en-us/p/wicket-the-ewok-crochet-pattern-by-lucy-collin
